confirmKill: Are you sure you want to kill process
noActiveProcesses: No active processes found matching criteria.
noScripts: No scripts found or package.json missing
heroDesc: The premium utility for developers and designers. Visualize active processes, kill hanging ports, and manage dev servers without touching the command line.
featureSafeDesc: Prevents accidental termination of system processes with smart filters and confirmation modes.
featureModernDesc: Built with a premium aesthetic and adjustable themes. Perfect for verifying pixel-perfect implementations on high-DPI displays.
featureDevDesc: Integrates with your package.json scripts to restart dev servers instantly.
author: Author
qcSubtitle: A comprehensive suite of tools to ensure your code meets the highest standards of performance, security, and maintainability.
qcGatesDesc: Automated checks for linting, tests, and build integrity before every commit.
qcLighthouseDesc: Visual analytics for performance, accessibility, and SEO scores over time.
qcMonitoringDesc: Live tracking of system status, uptime, and latency metrics.
qcAnalysisDesc: AI-powered insights to identify root causes of performance regressions.
qcCommitsDesc: Enforce conventional commit messages and automated changelog generation.
qcSecurityDesc: Automated dependency scanning and vulnerability detection.
qcOpenSourceDesc: Quality Core is built to be the backbone of modern web projects. It's fully open-source and customizable to fit your specific workflow needs.
updatesDesc: Track the development progress and latest changes.
failedUpdates: Failed to load updates. Please check GitHub directly.
authorRole: Full-stack developer passionate about building high-performance tools and intuitive user experiences.
wallDesc: A premium wallpaper collection generator for minimalists.
contactDesc: Interested in collaborating or have questions about PortCmd?
